Class ec.meta.StdObj 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.meta.StdObj
public class StdObj
extends Object
implements Obj, Serializable
This is the standard implementation of the Obj interface. Most classes extend this one. This class also provides static methods to mimic the Obj interface methods when merely given Objects to work with. This allows one, to, e.g., call respond on an Integer.

debugInvokePrint 
 public static void debugInvokePrint(String label,
                                     Object target,
                                     Method method,
                                     Object args[])
Debugging routine to print out invoke info.

Parameters:
label - a label for the output line
target - the target of the invoke
method - the method to invoke
args - the arguments of the method
